short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Masterschool Campus Chrome extension guides Masterschool students in their immersive online learning experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our students learn flexibly online on several platforms and the Campus app is a learning hub that orchestrates it all, guiding and supporting students as they move from step to step.
The Campus app was built as a one-stop-shop to streamline student training. Itâ€™s the place where students can currently track their progress, take quizzes, view the live schedule of live classes, and access learning content and enriching materials. In the future, students will be able to access a knowledge hub, schedule meetings, and feel a sense of community with challenges, suggestions and favorite features.
